verses.verse: וּפְלִשְׁתִּים֙ <WH6430> u-fe-lish-Tim And the Philistines לָֽקְח֔וּ <WH3947> la-ke-Chu, took אֵ֖ת <WH853> 'et אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> a-Ron the ark הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him; of God וַיְבִאֻ֛הוּ <WH935> vay-vi-'U-hu and brought מֵאֶ֥בֶן me-'E-ven הָעֵ֖זֶר <WH72> ha-'E-zer it from Ebenezer אַשְׁדּֽוֹדָה׃ <WH795> ash-Do-dah. unto Ashdod

וַיִּקְח֤וּ <WH3947> vai-yik-Chu took פְלִשְׁתִּים֙ <WH6430> fe-lish-Tim When the Philistines אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> a-Ron the ark הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God וַיָּבִ֥יאוּ <WH935> vai-ya-Vi-'u they brought אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> o-To בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit it into the house דָּג֑וֹן <WH1712> da-Gon; of Dagon וַיַּצִּ֥יגוּ <WH3322> vai-yatz-Tzi-gu and set אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> o-To אֵ֥צֶל <WH681> 'E-tzel it by דָּגֽוֹן׃ <WH1712> da-Gon. Dagon

וַיַּשְׁכִּ֤מוּ <WH7925> vai-yash-Ki-mu arose early אַשְׁדּוֹדִים֙ <WH796> ash-do-Dim And when they of Ashdod מִֽמָּחֳרָ֔ת <WH4283> mi-mo-cho-Rat, on the morrow וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh behold דָג֗וֹן <WH1712> da-Gon, behold Dagon נֹפֵ֤ל <WH5307> no-Fel [was] fallen לְפָנָיו֙ <WH6440> le-fa-Nav upon his face אַ֔רְצָה <WH776> 'Ar-tzah, to the earth לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> lif-Nei before אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> a-Ron the ark יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD וַיִּקְחוּ֙ <WH3947> vai-yik-Chu And they took אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- דָּג֔וֹן <WH1712> da-Gon, Dagon וַיָּשִׁ֥בוּ <WH7725> vai-ya-Shi-vu again אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> o-To לִמְקוֹמֽוֹ׃ <WH4725> lim-ko-Mo. him in his place

וַיַּשְׁכִּ֣מוּ <WH7925> vai-yash-Ki-mu And when they arose early בַבֹּקֶר֮ <WH1242> vab-bo-Ker morning מִֽמָּחֳרָת֒ <WH4283> mi-mo-cho-Rat on the morrow וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh behold דָג֗וֹן <WH1712> da-Gon, behold Dagon נֹפֵ֤ל <WH5307> no-Fel [was] fallen לְפָנָיו֙ <WH6440> le-fa-Nav upon his face אַ֔רְצָה <WH776> 'Ar-tzah, to the ground לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> lif-Nei before אֲר֣וֹן <WH727> a-Ron the ark יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD וְרֹ֨אשׁ <WH7218> ve-Rosh and the head דָּג֜וֹן <WH1712> da-Gon of Dagon וּשְׁתֵּ֣י׀ <WH8147> u-she-Tei and both כַּפּ֣וֹת <WH3709> kap-Pot the palms יָדָ֗יו <WH3027> ya-Dav, of his hands כְּרֻתוֹת֙ <WH3772> ke-ru-tOt [were] cut off אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- on הַמִּפְתָּ֔ן <WH4670> ham-mif-Tan, upon the threshold רַ֥ק <WH7535> rak but דָּג֖וֹן <WH1712> da-Gon only [the stump of] Dagon נִשְׁאַ֥ר <WH7604> nish-'Ar was left עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> 'a-Lav. and

עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and כֵּ֡ן <WH3651> ken after that לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- neither יִדְרְכוּ֩ <WH1869> yid-re-Chu tread כֹהֲנֵ֨י <WH3548> cho-ha-Nei Therefore neither the priests דָג֜וֹן <WH1712> da-Gon of Dagon וְכָֽל־ <WH3605> ve-chol all הַבָּאִ֧ים <WH935> hab-ba-'Im nor any that come בֵּית־ <WH1004> beit- house דָּג֛וֹן <WH1712> da-Gon into Dagon's עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on מִפְתַּ֥ן <WH4670> mif-Tan on the threshold דָּג֖וֹן <WH1712> da-Gon of Dagon בְּאַשְׁדּ֑וֹד <WH795> be-'ash-Dod; in Ashdod עַ֖ד <WH5704> 'ad against הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> haz-Zeh. to this ס sa-Mek

וַתִּכְבַּ֧ד <WH3513> vat-tich-Bad was heavy יַד־ <WH3027> yad- But the hand יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- on הָאַשְׁדּוֹדִ֖ים <WH796> ha-'ash-do-Dim upon them of Ashdod וַיְשִׁמֵּ֑ם <WH8074> vay-shim-Mem; and he destroyed וַיַּ֤ךְ <WH5221> vai-Yach them and smote אֹתָם֙ <WH853> 'o-Tam ; בָּעֳפָלִים bo-'o-fa-lim כבַּטְּחֹרִ֔ים <WH6076> bat-te-cho-Rim, stronghold קאֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אַשְׁדּ֖וֹד <WH795> ash-Dod [even] Ashdod וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et גְּבוּלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH1366> ge-vu-Lei-ha. and the coasts

וַיִּרְא֥וּ <WH7200> vai-yir-'U saw אַנְשֵֽׁי־ <WH582> 'an-shei- And when the men אַשְׁדּ֖וֹד <WH795> ash-Dod of Ashdod כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- that it was כֵ֑ן <WH3651> Chen; so וְאָמְר֗וּ <WH559> ve-'a-me-Ru, that [it was] so they said לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- must not יֵשֵׁ֞ב <WH3427> ye-Shev shall not abide אֲר֨וֹן <WH727> a-Ron The ark אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei of the God יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel עִמָּ֔נוּ <WH5973> 'im-Ma-nu, with כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for קָשְׁתָ֤ה <WH7185> ka-she-Tah is sore יָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> ya-Do with us for his hand עָלֵ֔ינוּ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-nu, and וְעַ֖ל <WH5921> ve-'Al on דָּג֥וֹן <WH1712> da-Gon upon us and upon Dagon אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu. our god

וַיִּשְׁלְח֡וּ <WH7971> vai-yish-le-Chu They sent וַיַּאַסְפוּ֩ <WH622> vai-ya-'as-Fu therefore and gathered אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all סַרְנֵ֨י <WH5633> sar-Nei all the lords פְלִשְׁתִּ֜ים <WH6430> fe-lish-Tim of the Philistines אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Hem, to וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru unto them and said מַֽה־ <WH4100> mah- What נַּעֲשֶׂ֗ה <WH6213> na-'a-Seh, What shall we do לַֽאֲרוֹן֙ <WH727> la-'a-rOn with the ark אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei of the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> vai-Yo-me-Ru, and said גַּ֣ת <WH1661> gat unto Gath יִסֹּ֔ב <WH5437> yis-So, be carried about אֲר֖וֹן <WH727> a-Ron Let the ark אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei of the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וַיַּסֵּ֕בּוּ <WH5437> vai-yas-Seb-bu about אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲר֖וֹן <WH727> a-Ron the ark אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei of the God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel ס sa-Mek

וַיְהִ֞י <WH1961> vay-Hi become אַחֲרֵ֣י׀ <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei And it was [so] that after הֵסַ֣בּוּ <WH5437> he-Sab-bu they had carried it about אֹת֗וֹ <WH853> o-To, וַתְּהִ֨י <WH1961> vat-te-Hi become יַד־ <WH3027> yad- the hand יְהוָ֤ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD בָּעִיר֙ <WH5892> ba-'Ir was against the city מְהוּמָה֙ <WH4103> me-hu-Mah destruction גְּדוֹלָ֣ה <WH1419> ge-do-Lah great מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> me-'Od, with a very וַיַּךְ֙ <WH5221> vai-yaCh and he smote אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> 'an-Shei the men הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir, of the city מִקָּטֹ֖ן <WH6996> mik-ka-Ton both small וְעַד־ <WH5704> ve-'ad- against גָּד֑וֹל <WH1419> ga-Dol; and great וַיִּשָּׂתְר֥וּ <WH8368> vai-yis-sa-te-Ru in their secret parts לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem ; עֳפָלִים 'o-fa-lim כטְחֹרִֽים׃ <WH6076> te-cho-Rim. stronghold ק

וַֽיְשַׁלְּח֛וּ <WH7971> vay-shal-le-Chu Therefore they sent אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲר֥וֹן <WH727> a-Ron the ark הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him of God עֶקְר֑וֹן <WH6138> ek-Ron; to Ekron וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> vay-Hi, become כְּב֨וֹא <WH935> ke-Vo came אֲר֤וֹן <WH727> a-Ron And it came to pass as the ark הָאֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him of God עֶקְר֔וֹן <WH6138> ek-Ron, to Ekron וַיִּזְעֲק֨וּ <WH2199> vai-yiz-'a-Ku cried out הָֽעֶקְרֹנִ֜ים <WH6139> ha-'ek-ro-Nim that the Ekronites לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> le-Mor, saying הֵסַ֤בּוּ <WH5437> he-Sab-bu They have brought about אֵלַי֙ <WH413> 'e-Lai about אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲרוֹן֙ <WH727> 'a-rOn the ark אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei of the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel לַהֲמִיתֵ֖נִי <WH4191> la-ha-mi-Te-ni to us to slay וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et עַמִּֽי׃ <WH5971> 'am-Mi. us and our people

וַיִּשְׁלְח֨וּ <WH7971> vai-yish-le-Chu So they sent וַיַּאַסְפ֜וּ <WH622> vai-ya-'as-Fu and gathered together אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all סַרְנֵ֣י <WH5633> sar-Nei all the lords פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <WH6430> fe-lish-Tim, of the Philistines וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru and said שַׁלְּח֞וּ <WH7971> shal-le-Chu Send away אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲר֨וֹן <WH727> a-Ron the ark אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei of the God יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel וְיָשֹׁ֣ב <WH7725> ve-ya-Sho and let it go again לִמְקֹמ֔וֹ <WH4725> lim-ko-Mo, to his own place וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- so יָמִ֥ית <WH4191> ya-Mit that it slay אֹתִ֖י <WH853> 'o-Ti וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et עַמִּ֑י <WH5971> 'am-Mi; us not and our people כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for הָיְתָ֤ה <WH1961> ha-ye-Tah become מְהֽוּמַת־ <WH4103> me-hu-mat- destruction מָ֙וֶת֙ <WH4194> ma-vet for there was a deadly בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol throughout הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir, throughout all the city כָּבְדָ֥ה <WH3513> ka-ve-Dah heavy מְאֹ֛ד <WH3966> me-'Od was very יַ֥ד <WH3027> yad the hand הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him of God שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> Sham. there

וְהָֽאֲנָשִׁים֙ <WH376> ve-ha-'a-na-Shim and the men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- did not מֵ֔תוּ <WH4191> Me-tu, that died הֻכּ֖וּ <WH5221> huk-Ku not were smitten; בָּעֳפָלִים bo-'o-fa-lim כבַּטְּחֹרִ֑ים <WH6076> bat-te-cho-Rim; stronghold קוַתַּ֛עַל <WH5927> vat-Ta-'al went up שַֽׁוְעַ֥ת <WH7775> shav-'At and the cry הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir of the city הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim. to heaven
